title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, and basic programming concepts.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Explore the world of algorithms, algorithmic analysis, and problem-solving techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Get started with C++ and learn how to use it for data structures and algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Study fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and trees, and learn how to implement them.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover object-oriented programming (OOP) principles in Python and how to design and build Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn software engineering principles, including software development methodologies and best practices.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Dive into cloud computing with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and understand cloud infrastructure and services.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Explore MySQL, a popular relational database management system, and learn how to manage databases.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Focus on problem-solving techniques and strategies to tackle complex programming challenges.
